#T_SP=webanno.custom.Referent|entity|infstat
#T_RL=webanno.custom.Coref|type|BT_webanno.custom.Referent
#Text=African troops invade rebel-held island of Anjouan
#Text=Wednesday , March 26 , 2008
#Text=Comoros , backed by African Union forces , has invaded the island of Anjouan in an effort to topple the rebel leadership of Mohamed Bacar , who has been seeking independence from Comoros .
#Text=Around 450 troops disembarked on Monday , landing in the capital of Mutsamudu on Tuesday at dawn , where a jubilant crowd cheered for them .
#Text=They joined the nearly 1,500 African Union forces from Sudan and Tanzania , with Libya , France , and the United States providing logistical support for the operation .
#Text=The Comoros government says they have already captured most of the island .
#Text=" The operation started in the early morning hours and it is going smoothly and according to plan , " said Abdourahim Said Bakar , a government spokesman .
#Text=" The military has taken control over most of the island - the airport and Anjouan 's capital , Mutsamudu .

column3:
_	_	_	_

#Text=There have been no official reports of casualties , but two African Union soldiers appear to have suffered minor injuries , and one reporter saw an elderly man being carried away after apparently being hit by a stray bullet .

#Text= We hope that by the end of the day we will have the problem resolved , " the government spokesman said .

#Text= I have over a hundred men and we will fight until we die , " said Lieutenant Ibrahim Moussa of the loyalists .

column1: #Text=" It 's God 's will that will decide who is to win and who is to die .

column3:

#Text= Colonel Mohamed Bacar has been spotted in the village of Sadanpoini where he is heading without doubt for a place to flee on board a kwassa ( small canoe ) towards Mayotte Island , " Abdourahim Said Bacar said .

column1: #Text=" It seems , according to various sources , that he is dressed as a woman , " he added .
#Text=However , this information has not been confirmed .
#Text=" The Comoran command will not confirm any information regarding the arrest of Colonel Bacar , " said reporter Franck Berruyer .
#Text=In a nationally televised address , Comoros president Ahmed Abdallah Mohamed Sambi said he had approved of the military operation .
#Text=" I have ordered the Comoran army and the forces of our country 's friends to bring Anjouan back under the rule of law and free her citizens , " he said .
#Text=Meanwhile , South African president Thabo Mbeki denounced the operation .
#Text=" It takes Comoros back to the use of force to solve a problem that could have been resolved with negotiations , " he said in a televised statement .
